title: Understanding the Power of Compound Interest and the Rule of 72
description: This chapter explores how compound interest works, introduces the Rule of 72 for estimating investment doubling time, and helps students apply these concepts to make informed financial decisions.
learning_objectives: Differentiate between simple and compound interest
Apply the Rule of 72 to estimate investment doubling time
Calculate compound interest growth using various parameters
Analyze the impact of time horizons on investment outcomes
Evaluate opportunity costs in financial decision-making
